description:
As an Embedded RF Solutions Engineer, you will impact the development, integration and customization of modem features on Android devices, targeting radio front-end, transceiver, and baseband control modules.

You will have the opportunity to participate in the product development lifecycle from inception and design to bring-up, optimization, verification and commercialization. You'll design and implement software modules to enable hardware characterization and tuning, and data analysis to optimize RF performance. Additionally, you'll design and develop power optimized systems to enable efficient RF front-end operations while maintaining RF emissions requirements.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, related technical field or equivalent practical experience.
  • Experience in embedded programming, including C, C++, Objective-C, or a similar language.
  • Experience with RF parameters and measurements.
  • Experience with cellular modem bring up and corresponding protocols and solutions (e.g., 2G/CDMA/3G/LTE, 5G, VoLTE, CA, etc.).

Preferred qualifications:

  • Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, related technical field or equivalent practical experience.
  • Development experience with wireless technologies (e.g., CDMA, E-HRPD, GSM, UMTS, TDS-CDMA, LTE-FDD or LTE-TDD, 5G).
  • Experience in Cellular Control or Data Plane Protocol Stack, and IP Multimedia Core Network Subsystems (IMS) technologies (e.g., VoLTE/vt, NAS, RRC, RLC, PDCP, MAC,PHY etc.).
  • Scripting and automation programming experience.
  • Knowledge of calibration algorithms for Tx power, XO, RSSI, Envelope tracking, IQ mismatch.
  • Familiarity with cellular tester, including CMW-500, Agilent EXT/8960 or equivalent.
responsibilities:
• Design and develop the RF front-end drivers and baseband control modules.
  • Develop power and performance optimized connectivity solutions.
  • Debug, triage and fix modem issues from factory, certification and field performance issues.
  • Develop innovative modem differentiators in RF system performance.
title: Embedded RF Solutions Engineer, Android Modem
